academic.title: Associate Professor
academic.content: Since 2022, I Joined ESTIN as an associate professor, in which I lecture in Data Science, Security Audit, and POO.

academic.title: Researcher
academic.content: Former PhD student within the laboratory LabGed, and currently an active researcher at LITAN LAB, ESTIN.

professional.title: Data Management Engineer
professional.content: As an Odoo developer and business analyst at Nechma Group Company, I collaborated within a team to analyze company needs and proposed solutions for automating information processes.

professional.title: Freelance Web Developer
professional.content: I worked on various web applications using React, VueJS, and Bootstrap. View some open-source samples.
